next_focus_candidates: 人類操作：Vercel 部署執行

focus_history.note: First gaps round - 5 gap hypotheses with 3-4 evidence each
Added 8 international retailers - PiShop UCTRONICS CanaKit Pimoroni ThePiHut CoreElectronics Botland GoTronic
Added 4 creators (MateoTechLab FABRI Build Some Stuff LeeCuriosity) + 2 gap hypotheses - creators now at 12/10 達標
Added 3 gap hypotheses (#8 cost barriers, #9 sim-to-real, #10 community fragmentation) - gaps now at 10/10 達標
Added 3 opportunity wedges: 繁中進階學習路徑, Sim-to-Real 過渡指南, 新手導航入口 - wedges 達標 3/3 - v1 完成
Added 6 new landscape entries (Nav2, LeRobot, Isaac Lab, Newton Physics, Thor, SO-ARM100). Updated gaps #3, #5, #6, #9 with new evidence/counterevidence. Gap #6 信心度 中→低, Gap #9 信心度 中→低.

Reinforced 3 entries: (1) NVIDIA Jetson - added Jetson Thor Series (Blackwell arch, 2070 TFLOPS); (2) LeRobot - updated to v0.4.3, added Unitree G1, X-VLA, Earth Rover Mini Plus; (3) LEGO SPIKE Prime - updated EOL details, successor products info. Round 20 = meta_status update.

Created wedge_validation/ directory. Added Wedge #3 MVP spec (3.8KB) and Wedge #2 Sim-to-Real Checklist v1.0 (4KB). Validated market need via Reddit API: r/robotics wiki last updated 2021-01 (5 years stale), r/AskRobotics top posts confirm navigation demand.

Round 22: (1) Created community launch kit with Reddit/HN/Discourse post drafts; (2) Created GitHub README draft; (3) Fixed critical ROS 1 EOL date error (2026→2025 in ROS Wiki + ROS entries); (4) Added Gazebo Ionic/Kura versions.

Round 23: Created Wedge #3 MVP core data files: (1) wedge_3_curated_resources.json (30 curated resources across 5 categories: learning 8, commerce 6, tools 6, communities 5, kits 5); (2) wedge_3_learning_paths.json (4 complete learning paths: wheeled, arm, drone, unsure - with 5 questions logic and step-by-step recommendations).

Round 24: Built complete MVP frontend scaffold in wedge_3_mvp/. Created: (1) package.json + next.config.js + tailwind.config.js; (2) 3 core React components (Questionnaire, PathCard, ResourceCard); (3) index.tsx homepage with locale toggle; (4) Complete i18n translations (en.json + zh-TW.json ~11KB combined). MVP is now ready for npm install && npm run dev.

Round 25: ✅ MVP 本地運行成功！(1) 修復 next.config.js (移除錯誤的 localeDetection); (2) 創建 _app.tsx + globals.css (~10KB 完整樣式); (3) 創建 postcss.config.js + .gitignore; (4) 驗證：npm install 成功, npm run dev 成功, curl localhost:3000 返回正確 HTML。問卷、語言切換、進度條全部正常。
Round 26: ✅ 問卷 i18n 完善！(1) Questionnaire.tsx 改用 translations prop 獲取問題與選項翻譯; (2) PathCard.tsx 改用 translations 獲取路徑名稱/描述; (3) index.tsx 傳入翻譯物件。Build 成功, dev 測試顯示英文問卷正常。步驟詳情翻譯待後續處理。

Round 27: ✅ 步驟詳情 i18n 完成！(1) en.json +steps block (17 步驟完整翻譯: wheeled 5, arm 5, drone 4, unsure 3 - 含 title/goals/hardware/reason); (2) PathCard.tsx 重構使用 stepTranslation 獲取翻譯; (3) zh-TW.json +stepLabels。Build 成功。英文使用者現在看到完整英文步驟。
Round 28: ✅ 響應式設計全面強化！(1) PathCard.tsx 修復 .path-header 結構; (2) globals.css 添加 4 個響應式斷點 (768px/640px/480px/touch) + accessibility focus states + smooth scrolling。Build 成功。手機/平板體驗大幅提升。

Round 29: ✅ SEO 基礎設施完成！(1) _document.tsx (html lang, preconnect, theme-color); (2) robots.txt + sitemap.xml (hreflang); (3) manifest.json (PWA); (4) index.tsx 添加 Open Graph / Twitter Card / JSON-LD / canonical / hreflang; (5) en.json + zh-TW.json 添加 SEO block (優化標題/描述/關鍵字)。Build 成功。MVP 現在 SEO 就緒。

Round 30: ✅ OG Image 設計完成！(1) og-image.svg + og-image-zh.svg (雙語 SVG 原始檔); (2) og-image.png + og-image-zh.png (66KB + 64KB 自動轉換); (3) docs/og-image-spec.md (設計規格文件); (4) scripts/convert-og-images.mjs (sharp 轉換腳本); (5) index.tsx 更新支援 locale 特定圖片。Build 成功。社交分享圖片就緒。

Round 31: ✅ Vercel 部署準備！(1) 修復 symlinks 問題：創建 data/ 目錄，複製 curated_resources.json + learning_paths.json (29KB); (2) 更新 index.tsx import 路徑; (3) 創建 docs/DEPLOY_GUIDE.md (2KB); (4) 創建 vercel.json (1KB, 含安全頭和緩存策略); (5) Build 驗證成功。MVP 現在可以直接部署到 Vercel。

Round 32: Added 8 major physics/simulation tools: MuJoCo (12K stars), Drake (MIT/TRI), PyBullet, Brax, CoppeliaSim, Gymnasium (11K stars), EasyEDA, CARLA (14K stars). Discovered via best-of-robot-simulators repo (170 projects ranked).
Round 33: Added 8 kits - Freenove (Robot Dog, Big Hexapod, 4WD Car), Hiwonder ROS2 (MentorPi, ArmPi Ultra, ROSPug), UBTECH Alpha Mini, BirdBrain Finch Robot 2.0. Kits now at 18/10.

Round 34: Added 8 advanced learning resources via awesome-robotics discovery - Underactuated Robotics (MIT), Intro to Autonomous Robots (MIT Press), Modern Robotics (Northwestern), Planning Algorithms (LaValle), UC Berkeley CS287, Modern Robotics Coursera, Awesome Robotics, Awesome ROS2. Learning now at 25/15.

Round 35: Added 7 communities (Robotics Stack Exchange, RobotShop Community, ESP32 Forum, EEVblog Forum, All About Circuits, SparkFun Community, element14 Community) + 1 learning (Random Nerd Tutorials). Communities now at 25/15. Meta status update (every 5 rounds).

Round 36: Added 8 top-tier YouTube creators: Stuff Made Here (4.72M), Simone Giertz (2.81M), Mark Rober (72.4M), Michael Reeves (7.69M), William Osman (3.03M), Hacksmith Industries (15.4M), SmarterEveryDay (11.7M), Colin Furze (13.2M). Creators now at 20/10.
Round 37: Added 8 Traditional Chinese (Taiwan) resources: CAVEDU教育團隊/機器人王國, 傑森創工(JMaker), STEAM教育學習網, 台灣智能感測科技, iCShop, 旗標科技, 飆機器人, iT邦幫忙. chinese_ecosystem now at 19/10. Addresses Gap #4 繁中資源不足.

Round 38: Added 3 learning (Physical AI Textbook, Foundations Robotics Labs, Robotics Toolbox Python) + 5 toolchains (ManiSkill 3, Unity Robotics Hub, SimplerEnv, IR-SIM, OpenCat). Discovered via GitHub topics robotics-education/robotics-simulation. Learning 29/15, Toolchains 30/10.

Round 39: Added 8 international platforms: Fablab Taipei (繁中), Prometec (西語), Luis Llamas (西語), Switch Science (日語), Device Plus (日語), Elektor Magazine (歐洲多語), Naylamp Mechatronics (秘魯/拉美), Hardware Libre (西語). Addresses Gap #4 #7 (語言/地區不平衡). Platforms now at 24/15.

Round 40: Added 8 international retailers - Cytron (Malaysia), AG Electrónica (Mexico), Steren (LatAm), Robocraze (India), DeviceMart (Korea), Electromanía (Peru), Makerlab (Philippines), Tiendatec (Spain). Addresses Gap #7 #8 (language/region + cost barriers). Commerce now at 24/10. Meta status update (every 5 rounds).

Round 41: Added 8 international/non-English creators: ElectroBOOM (Iranian-Canadian 8.65M), Andreas Spiess (Swiss IoT), bitluni (German ESP32), HomoFaciens (German CNC), Electronoobs (Spanish Arduino), Akiyuki (Japanese LEGO), thang010146 (Vietnamese mechanics), Teaching Tech (Australian 3D printing). Creators now at 28/10. Addresses Gap #4 #7 language diversity.

Round 42: Added 8 ROS 2 core tools: BehaviorTree.CPP (Nav2 behavior trees), slam_toolbox (SLAM), Foxglove (observability), robot_localization (sensor fusion), ros2_control (hardware abstraction), PlotJuggler (data viz), RViz 2 (3D viz), rosbag2 (data recording). Toolchains now at 38/10. Discovered via GitHub topics behavior-tree.

Round 43: Added 8 entries for motor control hardware/software: SimpleFOC Library (toolchains), AS5600 magnetic encoder, mjbots moteus, Tinymovr, ODRI, TB6612FNG, SimpleFOC Shield/Mini, GelSight Mini (hardware). Hardware now at 26/15, Toolchains at 39/10.

Round 44: Added 8 educational robot kits: Ozobot EVO (25+ EdTech Awards), Wonder Workshop Dash (Virtual+Physical), Thymio II (EPFL open source), Edison V3 ($59 affordable), BBC micro:bit v2 (1M UK students), Arduino Alvik (€159), M5Stack StackChan (AI desktop robot), mBlock/CyberPi (Makeblock platform). Kits now at 26/10.

Round 45: Added 8 non-English communities - Mikrocontroller.net (DE), Robot-Maker (FR), Framboise314 (FR), Qiita (JP), Zenn (JP), Raspberry Pi France (FR), Raspberryme (FR), Pololu Forum. Addresses Gap #7 language diversity.

Round 46: Added 5 learning (NVIDIA Robotics Learning Path, HuggingFace LeRobot Tutorial, roboticsjobs.co.uk guide, Embodied AI Workshop, NVIDIA Omniverse Sim-to-Real) + 3 creators (Kevin Wood 52.8K, Nikodem Bartnik Isaac Sim, The Construct Jazzy 2025). Learning now at 34/15, Creators at 31/10. Meta status update (every 5 rounds). Addresses Gap #9 (sim-to-real).

Round 47: Added 8 open-source quadruped/humanoid hardware entries: Mini Pupper (MangDang, ROS2), Stanford Pupper v3 ($1000 BOM), OpenArm (7DOF $6500 bimanual), MEVIUS (sheet metal quadruped), Asimov v0 (12DOF bipedal), SpotMicro (community $200-400), Humanoid-Gym (Isaac Gym RL), Awesome Quadrupedal Robots (curated list). Hardware now at 34/15.

Round 48: Added 9 entries - Hong Kong makerspaces 4 (MakerBay, Warehouse, MakerSpace.hk, Inno Space) + Taiwan ROS2 training 2 (CADTC, ITTRAINING) + Traditional Chinese YouTube creators 3 (黃信惠, 旭豐老師, 佑來認真教). Addresses Gap #4 繁中資源不足.
Round 49: Added 8 new project sharing platforms (Kitspace, OpenHardware.io, CADLAB.io, WikiFactory, Tindie, Circuit Digest, PCBWay Community, Crowd Supply). Platforms now at 32/15.
Round 50: Updated Gap #3 #5 #9 with new counterevidence (LeRobot v0.4.3 X-VLA, Nav2 1.0.0, Isaac Lab expansion). All three gaps confidence level lowered. 50th consecutive ALLOW milestone!

Round 51: Added 8 international kits - Yahboom ROSMASTER X3/DOGZILLA/DOFBOT, ELECFREAKS Cutebot Pro/XGO-Rider, Keyestudio Smart Car, Adeept RaspTank, OSOYOO Mecanum. Addresses Gap #7 (language/region diversity).

Round 52: Added 8 international/beginner-focused creators - RootSaid (India 98.6K), Arduino Brasil (Brazil 28.4K), Mundo CNC con Arduino (Spanish 54.7K), Makerblog.at (German 24.7K), Ralph S Bacon (English 47.8K), PRO ROBOTS (Russian/English), Rachel De Barros (female maker), LeMaster Tech (37K). Creators now at 39/10. Addresses Gap #2 #7.

Round 53: Added 8 DIY robot hardware entries - linorobot2 (ROS2 mobile), Papaya Pathfinder (ESP32 rover), MeArm (laser-cut arm), NURO Arm ($250 edu), SPIN Servo ($30 BLDC), STMBL (320V AC servo), SMARTmBOT (Purdue ROS2), Mars Rover (6WD 3D printed). Hardware now at 42/15.

Round 54: Added 9 cutting-edge learning resources via GitHub topics exploration - robosuite (Stanford/UT/NVIDIA benchmark), XLeRobot (LeRobot Mac fork), awesome-isaac-gym (curated list), RoboManipBaselines (AIST IL), VITA (ICLR 2026), isaaclab-groot-cloud-guide (CN/EN), AirGym (quadrotor RL), EmbodiChain (ICLR 2026), CQU_mobile_robot_course (中文 ROS 2). Learning now at 43/15. Addresses Gap #1 #4 #9.

Round 55: Added 8 international retailers - BerryBase (Germany Maker shop 20K+ products), EXP-Tech (Germany IoT), Conrad Electronic (Germany 10M+ products), AZ-Delivery (Germany microelectronics), Antratek (Germany embedded), Robotistan (Turkey), Akizuki Denshi (Japan), Sengoku (Japan). Commerce now at 32/10. Meta status update (every 5 rounds).

Round 56: Added 8 high-value Chinese resources - Embodied-AI-Guide (11.6K stars), LeRobotTutorial-CN (111 stars), lerobot-zh (35 docs), every-embodied (347 stars Datawhale), Mycobot_Tutorials (145 stars), d2l-ros2 (883 stars 魚香ROS), Roboto_origin (601 stars 人形機器人), foc-wheel-legged-robot (1.5K stars 輪腿). Addresses Gap #1 #2. chinese_ecosystem now at 36/10.

Round 57: Added 8 cutting-edge simulation/physics tools - mjlab (arXiv:2601.22074 Isaac Lab + MuJoCo-Warp), MuJoCo Warp (DeepMind+NVIDIA GPU physics), MuJoCo Playground (GPU-accelerated robot learning), Nimble Physics (Stanford differentiable), Jolt Physics (Horizon/Death Stranding), Project Chrono (multi-physics ROS2), ProtoMotions (NVIDIA humanoid training), Tinkercad (education). Toolchains now at 47/10.

Round 58: Attempted to find new evidence for Gap #1 #2 #7 (still high confidence). Resource limitations: (1) Brave Search API unavailable; (2) GitHub API rate limited; (3) Chrome browser not connected. Found d2l-ros2 v2 details (21 chapters, MoveIt2/Nav2/ROS2-Control/MicroROS) - potentially significant counterevidence for Gap #1 but entry already exists. Did not meet COMMIT_POLICY threshold (need ≥8 new entries OR ≥2 gaps OR ≥3 reinforcements).

Round 59: Found 4 new chinese_ecosystem candidates (Lumina, Awesome-Job, GetIoT ROS2, RoboTwin 2.0) + 4 hardware candidates (zeroth-bot, HOPEJr, Poppy, robot-learning-tutorial). Not enough for 8 entry threshold. Brave API unavailable. Added 8 URLs to backlog for next round.

Round 60: Added 8 open-source robot hardware platforms - zeroth-bot (humanoid $350 sim2real 747 stars), HOPEJr (humanoid arm LeRobot 746 stars), Poppy Humanoid (Inria research $8K 861 stars), EvoArm (3+2DOF robot arm), Gravis (mobile robot RPLidar), Eleo (French companion robot), OpenCatEsp32 (quadruped 159 stars), Lidarbot (ROS2 Humble Nav2 SLAM). Hardware now at 50/15. Consecutive SKIP streak broken (was 2).

Round 61: Added 8 robot learning resources - robot-learning-tutorial (451⭐ LeRobot VLA arXiv:2510.12403), 蘑菇書 EasyRL (13.6K⭐ Datawhale 中文 RL), RoboVerse (1.6K⭐ RSS 2025 unified platform), LIBERO (1.4K⭐ lifelong learning), RoboCasa (1.1K⭐ RSS 2024 everyday tasks), Rofunc (696⭐ LfD), Awesome-Robotics-Manipulation (837⭐ survey), ReinFlow (241⭐ NeurIPS 2025 Flow RL). Learning now at 51/15. Addresses Gap #1 #3 #4.

Round 62: Added 8 frontier embodied AI resources - Lumina community, Awesome-Embodied-AI-Job, RoboBrain 2.5 (BAAI), RLinf (RL infrastructure), InternNav (Shanghai AI Lab), DeepThinkVLA (OpenBMB/Tsinghua), StarVLA, Xbotics community. chinese_ecosystem now at 44.

saturation_notes.gaps_deepening: Round 58 SKIP due to resource constraints (no web_search API, GitHub rate limit, browser disconnected). Gap #1 #2 #7 remain high confidence. d2l-ros2 v2 is strong counterevidence but already captured in Round 56.
saturation_notes.chinese_ecosystem: Round 62 ALLOW: 8 high-quality embodied AI resources added. Lumina is China's leading embodied AI community. RoboBrain 2.5 from BAAI represents frontier research. RLinf provides RL infrastructure with Chinese docs. Category now at 44 entries.
saturation_notes.hardware: Round 60 ALLOW: Processed backlog candidates successfully. Humanoid platforms (zeroth-bot, HOPEJr, Poppy) represent emerging open-source alternatives to commercial systems.
saturation_notes.learning: Round 61 ALLOW: Rich discovery via GitHub topics robot-learning + imitation-learning. 蘑菇書 (13.6K⭐) is exceptional Chinese RL resource. RoboVerse/LIBERO/RoboCasa represent cutting-edge benchmarks. Learning highly saturated (51 entries).
saturation_notes.toolchains: Saturated at 55 entries (target 10). Round 62 skipped toolchains focus due to saturation. dora-rs and physical_ai_tools candidates remain for future rounds.
